name: Workbook-accessor
tagline: A friendly spreadsheet reader and writer for Java based on Apache POI
body:
workbook-accessor ============= A friendly workbook writer and reader for Java based on Apache POI ##Purpose Sometimes, you only need to do simple jobs with workbook files(Excel, Spreadsheet...).
The workbook-accessor provides you an easy and convenient way to manipulate workbooks in a breeze. ##Maven Repo ```xml com.github.wnameless workbook-accessor 1.1.0 ``` ##Quick Start ####WorkbookReader ```java WorkbookReader reader = new WorkbookReader("path_to_workbook"); for(List row : reader.toLists()) { // Print all the rows in workbook System.out.println(row); } ``` ####WorkbookWriter ```java WorkbookWriter writer = new WorkbookWriter("name_of_sheet"); writer.addRow(123, "abc", new Date()); writer.save("path_of_the_output_file"); ``` ##Feature Works on multiple sheets. ```java reader.turnToSheet("Sheet0"); writer.createAndTurnToSheet("NewSheet"); ``` More than one way to interate over the rows of a sheet. ```java reader.toCSV(); // Returns a Iterable reader.toLists(); // Returns a Iterable> reader.toArrays(); // Returns a Iterable reader.toMaps(); // Returns a Iterable> ``` More than one way to add a new row to a sheet. ```java writer.addRow(Arrays.asList("a", "b", "c")); // Accepts any Iterable writer.addRow(123, "abc", new Date()); // Object VarArgs ```
